House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04722
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING THE TEACHING OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OWNERSHIP PARTICULARLY COPYRIGHT LAW AS PART OF THE CURRICULUM OF ALL PRIMARY, SECONDARY, AND TERTIARY SCHOOLS IN THE COUNTRY, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to address the rampant issue of intellectual infringement and piracy and therefore instill the value of respect to the intellectual property rights of others as early as possible, which will ultimately lead to a sustained culture of respect and obedience to law in the generations to come.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ, MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R., MARTINEZ, ERIC M., VALERIANO, ROLANDO
